title: The “Should You Believe Juanita Broaddrick” Edition
description:
David
Plotz, Emily Bazelon and John Dickerson are joined by Slate
Contributor Frank Foer to discuss Paul Manafort's ties to Russia, the
violence in Milwaukee and political responses, and the return of
Juanita Broaddrick to the media spotlight. 
Join
Slate Plus! Members get bonus segments, exclusive member-only
podcasts, and more. Sign up for a free trial today at
www.slate.com/gabfestplus.

notes at slate.com/gabfest
